name: curve25519-dalek-lean-verify
description: A project to formally verify curve25519-dalek

scripts.docs:rust: RUSTDOCFLAGS='--cfg docsrs --html-in-header curve25519-dalek/docs/assets/rustdoc-include-katex-header.html' cargo +nightly-2025-07-20 rustdoc -p curve25519-dalek --features 'serde rand_core digest legacy_compatibility' && mkdir -p site/public/doc && cp -r target/doc/* site/public/doc/
